price: If you were to look around, you would see bliss and a vast dominion.
arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَيۡتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيۡتَ نَعِيمٗا وَمُلۡكٗا كَبِيرًا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
